name: Bamboo & White Grapefruit
description:
One of the most amazing fragrances we have ever smelled!  This fresh, complex fragrance begins with top notes of White Grapefruit, Petitgrain, and Tangerine; leading to middle notes of Mandarin, Tangerine, and Mimosa Petals; and balanced with base notes of Rainforest Bamboo, Juniper Berries, and Musk.

INGREDIENTS:
PALM OIL, COCONUT OIL, OLIVE OIL, SUNFLOWER OIL, FRAGRANCE OIL,MICA COLORANTS.

6 oz.

name: The Perfect Man
description:
The Perfect Man fragrance's begins with fresh, daring notes of Japanese grapefruit, bergamot, and lemon; followed by middle notes of peppercorn, ginger, jasmine, aquatic marine notes, and a hint of peppermint; sitting on base notes of natural patchouli, cedar, vetiver, labdanum, and frankincense. Now this is The Perfect Man! 


Ingredients:
Palm oil, Coconut oil, Olive oil, Shea butter, Cocoa butter, Fragrance oil, Beeswax, and Bentonite clay.

6 oz.

name: Spearmint & Rosemary
description:
The perfect light blend of light sweet, minty spearmint fragrance and all-natural rosemary essential oil make this soap a treat to use. 


INGREDIENTS:
PALM OIL, COCONUT OIL, OLIVE OIL, SUNFLOWER OIL, ESSENTIAL OIL, FRAGRANCE OIL, COCOA BUTTER, MICA COLORANT.

6 oz.

name: Pumpkin Walnut Biscotti
description:
The aroma of freshly baked Italian biscotti with delicious notes of pumpkin and fresh walnuts. Yum, this soap truly is a treat!


INGREDIENTS:
PALM OIL, COCONUT OIL, OLIVE OIL, SUNFLOWER OIL, FRAGRANCE OIL, COCOA BUTTER, MICA COLORANT.

6 oz.

name: Peppermint Twist
description:
This soap is made with a mix of essential mint oils. Peppermint, Spearmint, and Wintergreen mints all come together to give the soap a light refreshing scent!



INGREDIENTS:
PALM OIL, COCONUT OIL, RICE BRAN OIL, OLIVE OIL, PEPPERMINT, WINTERGREEN, AND SPEARMINT ESSENTIAL OILS, MICA.

6 oz.
